mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.teacher_id, c.subject_id, c.subject_parent_id, c.title, c.price, c.lesson_num, c.cover, cd.description from edu_course c LEFT JOIN edu_course_description cd ON c.id = cd.id where c.id = #{id}

SELECT c.id, c.title, c.lesson_num AS lessonNum, c.price, c.cover, c.buy_count AS buyCount, c.view_count AS viewCount, c.status, c.publish_time AS publishTime, t.name AS teacherName, s1.title AS subjectParentTitle, s2.title AS subjectTitle
FROM edu_course c LEFT JOIN edu_teacher t ON c.teacher_id = t.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject s1 ON c.subject_parent_id = s1.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject s2 ON c.subject_id = s2.id
